messages.title: Better hospitales. Safer streets. Improved schools.
messages.content: LET'S GET ON WITH OUR PRIORITIES.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Get Brexit done with a deal - Ready to go from day one of a new parliament, protects jobs, trade, workers' rights and environmental standards. Ends the uncertainty.
Giving the Welsh Government an extra £1.2 billion for our Welsh NHS - Helping them to cut waiting times and invest in the treatments that matter.
20,000 extra police officers - Entrusting our police with the powers they need to make our streets safer.
Making more funding available for schools across Wales - So no matter where you live, your child gets the opportunities they deserve.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Just a handful of votes could decide this seat. This election will be very close. And your local vote in Brecon and Radnorshire will make the difference. Don't risk another hung parliament.

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit done with a deal.
issues.education: Making more funding available for schools across Wales.
issues.governance: Get Brexit done with a deal.
issues.health: Giving the Welsh Government an extra £1.2 billion for our Welsh NHS.

contactInformation.address: CCHQ, 4 Matthew Parker Street, London, SW1H 9HQ

quotes.text: Only a majority government can get on with the country's priorities.

images.caption: Graph showing a 32 seat majority needed and last time seats where Conservative is just short of a majority.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Alan Mabbutt on behalf of the Conservative and Unionist Party, both at 4 Matthew Parker Street, London. Printed by Paragon CC, Park House, Finsbury Circus, London.
